Regulation Name(s): Immunomagnetic circulating cancer cell selection and enumeration system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CellTracks Analyzer II, a semi-automated fluorescence microscope for immunomagnetic enumeration of circulating cancer cells
Indications for Use Summary: Semi-automated fluorescence microscope to enumerate fluorescently labeled cells immunomagnetically selected and aligned; for in vitro diagnostic use in tandem with specimen preparation equipment and legally marketed reagents
